message.raw:
removed some testing codes and re-enabled some features.
 * moved physicsUpdateRate computation into loop for dynamic update rate changes.
 * re-enabled locks needed to prevent race condition errors.
 * contact visuals size set to 0 when not viewed.
 * fixed StereoCamera to use renderTexutres and renderTargets provided by base class.
